title: Psalm 4.1.1 crashes during "psalm --init"
body:
#### Preparation
```
$ curl -s https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
$ ./composer.phar selfupdate --1
$ ./composer.phar create-project --no-dev oxid-esales/oxideshop-project my_oxid_eshop_project dev-b-6.2-ce
$ cd my_oxid_eshop_project
$ wget https://github.com/vimeo/psalm/releases/download/4.1.1/psalm.phar
```
#### `psalm --init`
```
$ php psalm.phar --init
Calculating best config level based on project files
Scanning files...
Analyzing files...

░░░E░░E░E░EE░E░E░EEEUncaught Exception: Could not get class storage for oxadmindetails
Stack trace in the forked worker:
#0 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/StaticCallAnalyzer.php(70): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('oxAdminDetails')
#1 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(76): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\StaticCallAnalyzer::analyze(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(_HumbugBox25bd05a63db9\PhpParser\Node\Expr\StaticCall), Object(Psalm\Context))
#2 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(31): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::handleExpression(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(_HumbugBox25bd05a63db9\PhpParser\Node\Expr\StaticCall), Object(Psalm\Context), false, Object(Psalm\Context), true)
#3 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(354): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::analyze(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(_HumbugBox25bd05a63db9\PhpParser\Node\Expr\StaticCall), Object(Psalm\Context), false, Object(Psalm\Context), true)
#4 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/StatementsAnalyzer.php(146): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer::analyzeStatement(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(_HumbugBox25bd05a63db9\PhpParser\Node\Stmt\Expression), Object(Psalm\Context), Object(Psalm\Context))
#5 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/FunctionLikeAnalyzer.php(355): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer->analyze(Array, Object(Psalm\Context), Object(Psalm\Context), true)
#6 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ClassAnalyzer.php(867): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\FunctionLikeAnalyzer->analyze(Object(Psalm\Context), Object(Psalm\Internal\Provider\NodeDataProvider), Object(Psalm\Context))
#7 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ClassAnalyzer.php(344): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassAnalyzer->analyzeClassMethod(Object(_HumbugBox25bd05a63db9\PhpParser\Node\Stmt\ClassMethod), Object(Psalm\Storage\ClassLikeStorage), Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassAnalyzer), Object(Psalm\Context), Object(Psalm\Context))
#8 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/FileAnalyzer.php(170): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassAnalyzer->analyze(Object(Psalm\Context), Object(Psalm\Context))
#9 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(268): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\FileAnalyzer->analyze(NULL)
#10 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Fork/Pool.php(150): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->Psalm\Internal\Codebase\{closure}(12, '/tmp/my_oxid_es...')
#11 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(315): Psalm\Internal\Fork\Pool->__construct(Array, Object(Closure), Object(Closure), Object(Closure), Object(Closure))
#12 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(223): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->doAnalysis(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer), 3)
#13 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(451): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->analyzeFiles(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer), 3, false, true)
#14 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/psalm.php(463): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->check('/tmp/my_oxid_es...', true)
#15 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/psalm(5): require_once('phar:///tmp/my_...')
#16 /tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar(14): require('phar:///tmp/my_...')
#17 {main} in phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Fork/Pool.php:284
Stack trace:
#0 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Fork/Pool.php(312): Psalm\Internal\Fork\Pool->readResultsFromChildren()
#1 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(350): Psalm\Internal\Fork\Pool->wait()
#2 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Analyzer.php(223): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->doAnalysis(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer), 3)
#3 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ProjectAnalyzer.php(451): Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Analyzer->analyzeFiles(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer), 3, false, true)
#4 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/src/psalm.php(463): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ProjectAnalyzer->check('/tmp/my_oxid_es...', true)
#5 phar:///tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar/psalm(5): require_once('phar:///tmp/my_...')
#6 /tmp/my_oxid_eshop_project/psalm.phar(14): require('phar:///tmp/my_...')
#7 {main}
(Psalm 4.1.1@16bfbd9224698bd738c665f33039fade2a1a3977 crashed due to an uncaught Throwable)
```
Due to #4635, I cannot test with Psalm 4.2.0.
